name: sitchco-project-root
description: Project root using sitchco module builder

scripts.clean: sitchco clean; find . -type d -name node_modules -prune -exec rm -rf {} \;
scripts.dev:setup: rm -rf ./packages && git clone git@github.com:sitchco/sitchco-packages.git ./packages && (cd ./packages && pnpm install) && pnpm link ./packages/packages/*/*
scripts.dev:teardown: pnpm unlink && rm -rf ./packages && git restore package.json && pnpm install
